item.description:
OK we actually lost count a long time ago but with the feel good thing this place has going we might as well make it an official meetup.

Diane Blue and the Fatback Blues band will keep people dancing until the wee hours, you can count on that.

Schedule:

Meet for dinner @ Central Kitchen (optional) 8pm
Head over to Cantab 9:30p (across the street)
Plenty of free parking after 8pm (typically)

Attire: dancing shoes

Finding the group: Ask the bartender, unless you are there early we will let them know who/where
item.name: CANTAB - Motown Night #99
